00020 
00021 public class MaxDBDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00022 
00023     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "SAP DB";
00024     protected Set<String> systemTablesAndViews = new HashSet<String>();
00025 
00026     public MaxDBDatabase() {
00027         super();
00028         systemTablesAndViews.add("---");
00029 
00030         systemTablesAndViews.add("ACTIVECONFIGURATION");

00092 
00093     public Set<String> getSystemTablesAndViews() {
00094         return systemTablesAndViews;
00095     }
00096 
00097     public String getProductName() {
00098         return "MaxDB";
00099     }
00100 
00101     public String getTypeName() {
00102         return "maxdb";
00103     }
00104 
00105     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00106         return false;
00107     }
00108 
00109     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00110         return true;
00111     }
00112 
00113     public String getBooleanType() {
00114         return "BOOLEAN";
00115     }
00116 
00117     public String getCurrencyType() {
00118         return "NUMERIC(15, 2)";
00119     }
00120 
00121     public String getUUIDType() {
00122         return "CHAR(36)";
00123     }
00124 
00125     public String getClobType() {
00126         return "LONG VARCHAR";
00127     }
00128 
00129     public String getBlobType() {
00130         return "LONG BYTE";
00131     }
00132 
00133     public String getDateTimeType() {
00134         return "TIMESTAMP";
00135     }
00136 
00137     public String getDateType() {
00138         return "DATE";
00139     }
00140 
00141     public String getTimeType() {
00142         return "TIME";
00143     }
00144 
00145     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00146         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00147     }
00148 
00149     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00150         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sapdb")) {
00151             return "com.sap.dbtech.jdbc.DriverSapDB";
00152         }
00153         return null;
00154     }
00155 
00156     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00157         return "TIMESTAMP";
00158     }
00159 
00160     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00161         return "TRUE";
00162     }
00163 
00164     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00165         return "FALSE";
00166     }
00167 
00168     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {//NOPMD
00169         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();
00170     }
00171 
00172     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00173         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQUENCE_NAME FROM DOMAIN.SEQUENCES WHERE OWNER = '"
00174                 + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00175     }
00176 
00177     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00178         if (super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00179             return true;
00180         } else if ("DOMAIN".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00181             return true;
00182         } else if ("SYSINFO".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00183             return true;
00184         } else if ("SYSLOADER".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00185             return true;
00186         } else if ("SYSDBA".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00187             return true;
00188         }
00189         return false;
00190     }
00191 
00192     public boolean isSystemView(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00193         if (super.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)) {
00194             return true;
00195         } else if ("DOMAIN".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00196             return true;
00197         } else if ("SYSINFO".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00198             return true;
00199         } else if ("SYSLOADER".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00200             return true;
00201         } else if ("SYSDBA".equalsIgnoreCase(schemaName)) {
00202             return true;
00203         }
00204         return false;
00205     }
00206 
00207     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00208         return false;
00209     }
00210 
00211     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00212         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT DEFINITION FROM DOMAIN.VIEWDEFS WHERE upper(VIEWNAME)='" + name.toUpperCase()
00213                 + "' AND OWNER='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00214     }
00215 
00216     public boolean supportsAutoIncrement() {
00217         return false;
00218     }
00219 
00220     public String convertJavaObjectToString(Object value) {
00221         if (value instanceof Boolean) {
00222             if (((Boolean) value)) {
00223                 return this.getTrueBooleanValue();
00224             } else {
00225                 return this.getFalseBooleanValue();
00226             }
00227         } else {
00228             return super.convertJavaObjectToString(value);
00229         }
00230     }
00231 
00232     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00233         return new MaxDBDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00234     }
00235 }
